armor.helmet: execute as @s if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:103b,id:"<id>"}]}] run scoreboard players set #player.armorTemp4 bb.variable <temperature>
armor.chestplate: execute as @s if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:102b,id:"<id>"}]}] run scoreboard players set #player.armorTemp3 bb.variable <temperature>
armor.leggings: execute as @s if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:101b,id:"<id>"}]}] run scoreboard players set #player.armorTemp2 bb.variable <temperature>
armor.boots: execute as @s if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:100b,id:"<id>"}]}] run scoreboard players set #player.armorTemp1 bb.variable <temperature>

metal_armor.helmet: execute as @s if score @s tmp.totalTemp matches <temperature_range> if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:103b, id:"<id>"}]}] run scoreboard players set #player.armorTemp4 bb.variable <temperature>
metal_armor.chestplate: execute as @s if score @s tmp.totalTemp matches <temperature_range> if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:102b, id:"<id>"}]}] run scoreboard players set #player.armorTemp3 bb.variable <temperature>
metal_armor.leggings: execute as @s if score @s tmp.totalTemp matches <temperature_range> if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:101b, id:"<id>"}]}] run scoreboard players set #player.armorTemp2 bb.variable <temperature>
metal_armor.boots: execute as @s if score @s tmp.totalTemp matches <temperature_range> if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:100b, id:"<id>"}]}] run scoreboard players set #player.armorTemp1 bb.variable <temperature>
